name: I spent new years with girls I just met (Winter VN Jam 2021 Version)
name_original: I spent new years with girls I just met (Winter VN Jam 2021 Version)
description:
Daniel just moved to a town where he will start school after the new year starts. On new years eve someone knocks on the door to his apartment. When he opens the door there were three girls stading there, saying that they are going to stay until after the new year starts. Daniel (not wanting to be alone) lets them in but he wonders. Who are they? Why are they here?

Credits: 

Music: Tungerman and WoWsound.com

Director: Filip Fraenell Olsén

Story: Filip Fraenell Olsén

Game made by: Filip Fraenell Olsén
